Personally think you should look beyond dbs. Many other cashback and miles cards.
No requirement to have account and credit card with same bank
You're limiting yourself to DBS for no good reason
For cashback  you could consider Citi Cashback/ UOB Evol/ DBS yuu (18%)
For miles  Citi Rewards/ HSBC Revolution/ UOB Lady/ DBS WWMC
Pls do your own due diligence to see what is good for you. Esp for miles card  should also consider your value of a mile  conversion blocks  expiry etc
DBS Live Fresh. $400 contactless and $400 online for $40 rebate per month.
